original_text:
The nations shall see your righteousness,
    and all the kings your glory,
and you shall be called by a new name
    that the mouth of the Lord will give.
korean_text: 이방 나라들이 네 공의를, 뭇 왕이 다 네 영광을 볼 것이요 너는 여호와의 입으로 정하실 새 이름으로 일컬음이 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: The nations shall see your righteousness
and all the kings your glory
and you shall be called by a new name
that the mouth of the Lord will give.
